page.title: 14RAUCEBY HOSPITAL VOLUNTEERS
page.content:
{ {Rauceby hospital}provides a wide range of activities for the patients, run by volunteers. The activities provided include art and craft skills, going for walks, film shows, lace making, spinning, flower arranging and guitar playing.
Mr Rob Kendrick is the{Voluntary {Services Organiser. }He helps to improve the patient's life by making it easier and more cheerful. Mrs Lesley Weldon is a{volunteer}who regularly visits the hospital. She goes on a Tuesday at 6.30 for about two hours. Whilst she is there she plays dominoes and cards and she chats to the patients.
